name: Chef Yummy
description:
Match 3 pieces and Complete the missions and challenge high scores by making special combinations.
Travelling across the world and spread the real food recipes, Solve addictive puzzles while collecting ingredients to cook actual dishes.

Start your chef cook career with this awesome game Yummy Swap!
Use various ingredients to cook many amazing recipes of delicious dishes and desserts like Pizza, Sandwich, Hamburger, blasting food from all over the world.
Match at least three of the same color vegetables to meet the tasty goals and complete the levels! Don't forget to use the powerful boosters to Crush your way.

HOW TO PLAY:
Swap and match 3 delicious food items of the same type.
Crush and drop yummy from the board.
Unlock amazing boosts and bonuses that blasting to solve challenges.
Reach high scores by discovering & solving special combinations on every tasty level.

FEATURES:
- Attractive, relaxing, free fun gameplay!
- Tons of amazing levels with challenging.
- Plenty of recipes! Unlock them and discover delicious cooking!
- With no time limits, you can use your time wisely to show your matching skills!
- No internet connection. Play Yummy Swap anywhere, anytime!

Sweet match 3 puzzles are looked forward to this addictive puzzle game. Let's Cook delicious.
